# Review and visualization applications

## Assessment review tools

### Assessment & data dashboard
To run locally:
```{r, eval=F}
irTools::asmntDashboard()
```
To run remotely:
[udwq.shinyapps.io/asmntDashboard](https://udwq.shinyapps.io/asmntDashboard/)
